completion of the approval process! After submitting the request to post your Ad on aaonri.com, you will have 24 hrs to make edits. Our Ad approval process may take upto 24 hrs. Your Ad will be available on our portal from the next day of submitting an order, From & To dates reflect based upon the time taken for approval and the duration you selected. Once the Ad is posted on aaonri.com (after 24 hrs) of posting, no edits will be allowed Please review details that you input carefully, if there is any objectionable content found, the advertisement will not be posted on aaonri.com All sales made are final, no refund will be allowed after 24 hrs of posting an advertisement.
